MemoryInfobox.description: 'A Spartan, delighted by the arrival of a 'Mercenary|misthios', soon shared his desire to clear the nearby camp of Athens|Athenians.'

General_Description: '''Sent by Brasidas''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Following her choice, Kassandra was faced with its consequences.
Section_Dialogue:
In the wilderness, Kassandra came upon Spartan soldiers and greeted them.
*'''Kassandra:''' Chaire'', soldier. How can I serve Sparta today?'' 
*'''Man:''' ''An [[eagle]]-bearing'' [[Mercenary|misthios]]''. [[Brasidas]] must have sent you.''
<tabber>
|-|I think you might be wrong.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I've met a Spartan named Brasidas, but he never mentioned anything about sending me anywhere.''
*'''Man:''' ''Oh, no need to be secretive. I know it's generally frowned upon to hire mercenaries for the Spartan army... but we're glad to have you.''
|-|Nobody send me anywhere.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm a mercenary, not a servant. Brasidas didn't send me anywhere.''
*'''Man:''' ''So fierce! So proud! And boy does Brasidas like his mercenaries interesting! You've got quite the attitude on you.''
</tabber>
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Really, I-''
*'''Man:''' ''It's good thing he did send you. I need to make sure the nearby camp is cleared of [[Athens|Athenians]] before the Spartan troops can move in.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''And you want me to kill all the Athenians. / So you're asking me to send all the Athenians to the [[underworld]].''
*'''Man:''' ''I knew I asked the right person.''
(Accept - Those soldiers are mine.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take care of it. ''
*'''Man:''' ''Ha! Excellent.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Leave it to me.''
Kassandra left the soldiers and sought out the Athenian camp nearby. After killing its occupants, she returned to the Spartans for her reward.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and slew the Athenians, gaining a reward for doing so.
Section_Trivia: *It is unknown what triggers this impact quest, beyond meeting Brasidas in [[Port of Lawlessness]].
